channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
earlier today i had problems with JDK update 11 got it fixed :) but now i can compile properly but when i run my server it says:
"java" is not recognised as a internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to continue...
and when i go to open the Moparscape client it says:
this file does not have a program associated with it for performing this action. create an association in the folder options control panel.
and the shortcut to Moparscape icon is a blank peice of paper. PLEASE HELP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! and i rep++

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @New_owner New_owner
item.description:
@New_owner wrote:

W0000000000000000t!!!
i fixed it!!! all i had to do was right click on the executable jar file and choose what program to use to open it and set options to always use that program to open it

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Sorry, I don’t know about that.
You can try running it with a batch file or from the command line, though.

"C:\Program Files\Java\Jre1.6.0_10\bin\java.exe" -jar Moparscape

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @New_owner New_owner
item.description:
@New_owner wrote:

ok downloaded both of them, the first link you gave me:

when i went to install it says downloading java installer - then closes then windows installer comes up then closes - then another box comes up java setup say this is alredy installed re-install click yes then closes and does same thing

second link - comes up to install then closes then a box comes up saying alredy installed re-install? and so on.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2008, 12:47:29 am[/size][hr]thankyou querty server works, now only problem left is:
executible java files - i can’t open 'em anymore and i need to so i can open Moparscape client
know how to fix it?

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

"C:\Program Files\Java\Jre1.6.0_10\bin\java.exe" server

See if that works.

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

u think its not that simple? i fixed up my vps in under 1 minute for my server lmao…

okay first go here and download this
set it to ur info

https://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_Developer-Site/en_US/-/USD/ViewProductDetail-Start?ProductRef=jdk-6u11-oth-JPR@CDS-CDS_Developer

next go here and click “Free Java Download”

http://java.com/en/download/windows_xpi.jsp?locale=en&host=java.com:80

try that then try compiling or watever ur trying 2 do lol

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @New_owner New_owner
item.description:
@New_owner wrote:

its not as simple as that, i don’t have update 11, and when i try installing update 11 it says already installed when its NOT!!!
so i got JRE update 10, installed fine and in c: - program files - Java
anything else i can do?

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

go to java.com and download the latest java

find the download button

-Gir
ps: you sir have just been spoonfed.

Read full topic
